mods.abstract: One color window card (blue on white) announcing the ASA 43rd Annual Conference featuring The Excello Legends Earl Gaines, Roscoe Shelton, Clifford Curry at the Opryland Hotel on March 25. Poster features metal photoplates of Earl Gains, Roscoe Shelton, and Clifford Curry.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
recordInfo.recordOrigin: Record has been transformed into MODS v3.5 from a Qualified Dublin Core record by the Digital Library of Tennessee, a service hub of the Digital Public Library of America.
